showScoreExcerpt:
“The musical’s primary assets are its splendid cast and the silly smartness of the integration of song and story. Which brings to mind the splendid, silly and smart performance of Jennifer Simard in the role of Cinderella’s stepmother...Ms. Simard, is one of Broadway’s unsung, or undersung, treasures, and her performance alone brings sufficient pleasure to make this trip to Britney-land worth a visit.”

Read more

keyPhrases.quote: her performance alone brings sufficient pleasure to make this trip to Britney-land worth a visit
The musical's primary assets are its splendid cast and the silly smartness of the integration of song and story
Ms. Simard, is one of Broadway's unsung, or undersung, treasures

llmScore.reasoning: The critic explicitly recommends seeing the show ('worth a visit') and praises both the cast and the integration of songs, with particular enthusiasm for Jennifer Simard's performance.
